div.div: NPV (mill EUR) from 2012 to 2037 for the four fleet segments for the baseline (scenario #1) and the three nutrient scenarios evaluated by FISHRENT (#2â€“#4).
div.p: Results based on original 2012 local ICES-based assessed fishing mortality (F) and total stock biomass (TSB) for the groups and areas listed in Table 3, compared to using Atlantis-based F and TSB.
